rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with ample space for reception and foyer; designed to incorporate Vastu principles by placing a water feature or greenery near the entrance.

Large open-plan living area that includes seating arrangements, entertainment center, and integrates indoor-outdoor connectivity. It is strategically placed for natural light with north-facing windows.
Open kitchen designed to merge with the living space; equipped with modern amenities, and arranged following industrial farmhouse aesthetics.
Dedicated dining area adjacent to the open-plan kitchen-living area ensuring convenience during meals while maintaining a cohesive design.
Spacious library room located in a quiet corner of the ground floor, designed with ample shelving and seating areas for reading, study, or relaxation.
Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, designed with Vastu principles by keeping heavy furniture away from windows.
Additional bedroom for family members, ensuring privacy and a restful environment.
A small bedroom or guest room integrated with minimalistic design and functional space.
Fourth bedroom designed for future expansion, adaptable to a study or additional family space if needed.
A multi-purpose room for family gatherings or as an extra relaxation space.

openings.description: North-facing main entrance designed to welcome positive energy and light, in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Large north-facing window adjacent to the entrance for natural illumination.
Multiple north-facing windows in the living area to ensure maximum light and airflow.
Kitchen window designed for natural light, positioned to avoid glare while maintaining ventilation.
